title: 7.9 League patch broken?
body: Being a giddy little bronzie scrub, I opened league on my macbook pro. Things started getting awry when during champ select, before I could select any champion, the client said I dodge the champ pick (its ranked btw :( ). After waiting 5 minutes, I finally got into a game, but then the game was messed up. I could only see a corner of the game and the game became difficult to access and exit out. This is  7.9 btw anybody with the same issue?

...And the resolution of the gamespace is the same once it loads up.

This is literally unplayable.
alt-enter to switch over to windowed mode, then do it again to switch back. This should fix the problem.
No, it won't. You won't be able to move the screen.
Have you tried it? When I do it the game 'refreshes' and pops back to its usual place.
Have same issue

THERE IS A FIX FOR THIS

It is not perfect and requires you to do it every game but it DOES fix the problem for a game.

When you get into the game, hit escape to open up the menu. You won't be able to see anything but you can click and drag it around so that you can. Go to the "video" tab and change from "fullscreen" to "windowed." Accept it. THEN CHANGE IT BACK. I'm on a MacBook pro and have been having the same problems, and this will fix it for the game and allow you to play in fullscreen mode. It's annoying, it's tedious, but it works.

Also I love all these Mac haters. They're probably writing from their phones because their laptop bluescreened.

EDIT: Alt+Enter will also accomplish the same thing without having to open up the menu.
THIS WORKS. Thank you so much. You saved me from wanting to throw my computer.
